product_name: Beekman 1802Oh! Mega Milk Fermented Barrier Boosting Facial Oil
summary: SummaryHighlightsClean IngredientsCruelty FreeSustainable PackagingGive BackBeekman 1802's Oh! Mega Milk is the first fermented facial oil to absorb 20% deeper with 90x more omega fatty acids in goat milk for glow without the grease.
details: DetailsBenefitsTransforms dull, dry skin into mega healthy, hydrated, and radiant skinGoat milk is rich in omega fatty acids and the fermented plant oils increase omega fatty acid content by 90x, for superior skin nourishment and hydrationStrengthens and repairs the skin barrierSilky after-feel that's never sticky or greasySafe for sensitive skinDermatologist-approvedKey IngredientsFermented Free Fatty Acid Rich Plant Oils: for 20% deeper skin penetration, 90x more free fatty acids and 2x the moisture retentionGoat Milk: rich in skin-nourishing vitamins and mineralsNiacinamide: softens skin, evens tone and improves elasticity for better agingVitamin C: helps boost skin brightness and even skin toneFormulated without parabens, sulfates, mineral oil, alcohol, skin-damaging exfoliantsResearch Results97% said instantly illuminates for a glazed finish9 out of 10 said this formula is unique compared to other facial oilsItem 2606960How To UseApply a few drops onto face, neck and décolletage, and massage into skin.For drier skin use as a last step over your moisturizer.IngredientsWater (Aqua), Caprylic/Capric Triglyceride, Cocos Nucifera (Coconut) Oil, HelianthusAnnuus (Sunflower) Seed Oil, Polyglyceryl-3 Polyricinoleate, Simmondsia Chinensis (Jojoba) Seed Oil, Candida Bombicola/Glucose/Methyl Rapeseedate Ferment, Olea Europaea (Olive) Fruit Oil, Argania Spinosa Kernel Oil, AngelicaGigas Root Extract, Lithospermum Erythrorhizon Root Extract, Glycyrrhiza Uralensis (Licorice) Root Extract, Tetrahexyldecyl Ascorbate, Niacinamide, Caprae Lac (Goat Milk), Tocopherol (Vitamin E), Rosmarinus Officinalis (Rosemary) Leaf Extract, Acetyl Zingerone, Diisostearoyl Polyglyceryl-3 Dimer Dilinoleate, Magnesium Sulfate, Phenylpropanol, Ethylhexylglycerin... and Kindness. Does not contain live cultures.Shipping & Coupon RestrictionsThis brand is excluded from most Ulta Beauty coupons.See brand eligibility details
how_to_use: Apply a few drops onto face, neck and décolletage, and massage into skin.For drier skin use as a last step over your moisturizer.
ingredients: Ethylhexylglycerin... and Kindness. Does not contain live cultures

reviews.headline: This is a wonderful skin base.
reviews.comments: I am in my 70's with drier skin.  The first time I used this, I was sold.  I applied to clean skin and let it dry a bit.   The moisture and shine felt and looked great.  I then applied my foundation which I think looked better because of the initial oil.  I will definitely continue to use this product.  I also have very sensitive skin so was very happy to find this product was so perfect.

reviews.headline: Amazing
reviews.comments: This serum is amazing and I absolutely love it! I originally got a small sample with something I ordered and loved it so much, so when this went on sale for BOGO I of course purchased it. This makes my face feel so soft and look so radiant. A little goes a long way! If you put too much it does make your face feel a little too oily. I have oily skin so when I use this I don't use moisturizer.

reviews.headline: Not for me...
reviews.comments:
I am a huge Beekman 1802 fan! 
But this product isn't for me. Fortunately I only had a sample. 
I have extremely sensitive skin. And as soon as I applied it as directed, my skin went red and there was a burning sensation....all over my face.  Noticeably red. Quickly washed it off with Beekman 1802 face soap .... Redness and burning sensation lessened a bit,but it was hours before it finally was gone. Skin still felt gummy though. And I  will say that this is probably a one in a million reaction,because Beekman 1802 products ARE that good.....but it is not for me. 
It did absorb nicely. But after almost immediate washing skin felt oily. Odor not unpleasant. 
I would recommend trying a sample first, just in case, before you purchase a regular size jar.

reviews.headline: AMAZING, OBSESSED
reviews.comments: I never write reviews, but I had to for this. I am OBSESSED with this product, I have extremely dry senstive skin and was nervous to try this but its calmed my skin down and leaves my skin sooo hydrated. I love the thick milky texture, ive already made all my friends try it and they love it too!

reviews.headline: AMAZING, OBSESSED
reviews.comments: I never write reviews, but I had to for this. I am OBSESSED with this product, I have extremely dry senstive skin and was nervous to try this but its calmed my skin down and leaves my skin sooo hydrated. I love the thick milky texture, ive already made all my friends try it and they love it too!

reviews.headline: My favorite nighttime face product
reviews.comments: This has become my favorite nighttime face product and is a luxurious addition to your routine. Especially in the winter when my skin needs a little extra moisture, this oil helps my skin feel amazingly silky! But it's also light enough for summertime so I use it year round!.

reviews.headline: Oh! Mazing for dry skin!!
reviews.comments: I am loving the Oh! mega milk face oil for my dry to very dry skin. It hydrates and plumps my skin like no other face oil I've tried. I will say this may be targetted for drier skin, which I'm grateful for because I feel like a lot products gear towards oily skin and I can never get enough hydration. I'm in my 2nd bottle, and loving it. I jus wish it had more product but overall Fantastic or dear I say "oh!mazing"

reviews.headline: Can't get past the smell
reviews.comments: Might be a good product but cant really give a fair change as the smell is off-putting.

reviews.headline: Works great
reviews.comments: After finishing the bottle, I have my thoughts collected. I have dry skin and wanted extra moisture during the winter, which this product worked really well for. At some point the dropper doesn't reach the product at the bottom. I just poured the rest out.

reviews.headline: One of my fav products EVER
reviews.comments: I have thin and dry skin, sometimes even lightweight moisturizers are too heavy and other facial oils I've tried don't seem to penetrate the surface like this product does. I also have eye eczema that flares up here and there and this is safe on flare ups and around the eyes! I also love their moisturizer!

reviews.headline: So Hydrating
reviews.comments: This product saved my skin from dry winter skin! I like to use as a serum and as a night oil, its like 2 products in one!

reviews.headline: Whoa the breakouts
reviews.comments: Got this as a sample and instead of purchasing it. I've never suffered from breakouts. The occasional pimple here and there. First time using this, woke up with 2 pimples. 2nd time, had about 4 and in odd places. And my skin feels dull and dried out.

reviews.headline: Nice product!  One I use regularly.
reviews.comments: This is deeply hydrating and great to use any time of year but particularly during the winter months.

reviews.headline: Award winning moisture!
reviews.comments: Even though I use this oil almost like a serum & mix it into my moisturizer, this oil is an award winning moisturizer all on its own… and for good reason! It packs in heavy moisture for the dryest skin (or for combo skin during the coldest winter months) and also has tightening qualities that work to address preventive anti-aging. I won't be caught in any November thru March season without my Oh Mega Milk!

reviews.headline: Award winning moisture!
reviews.comments: Even though I use this oil almost like a serum & mix it into my moisturizer, this oil is an award winning moisturizer all on its own… and for good reason! It packs in heavy moisture for the dryest skin (or for combo skin during the coldest winter months) and also has tightening qualities that work to address preventive anti-aging. I won't be caught in any November thru March season without my Oh Mega Milk!

reviews.headline: Amazing product for skin barrier issues
reviews.comments: So i originally blught this because i exfoliated too hard, and so id wake up in the morning to half of my face being crusty, and pale from dryness. My skin barrier was so damaged it would physically hurt to smile. I used this for about a week and a half and finally started waking up to a healthier face!

reviews.headline: love the feel, hate the smell
reviews.comments: it really doesn't smell good. it's like sour milk. luckily I use it at night, so at least I don't have to smell it while it's working it's magic

reviews.headline: Allergy reaction after a few uses
reviews.comments: I got an allergy reaction,  redness the areas where I apply the product...I really liked..the weird is I got the reaction after a few uses at night time. I will not use anymore.

reviews.headline: Good for my eye eczema!
reviews.comments: This is one of the few products that I use to help the dryness of my eye eczema flareups. It doesn't burn or sting, it's not thick and cakey, and provides lasting hydration that doesnt further irritate my eczema. This has saved me! I just take a few drops and pat it (not rub) around my eye areas alternating with another product.

reviews.headline: Breaks me out
reviews.comments: I wish this worked for me because the smell and texture are amazing. However, it breaks me out, especially around my eyes. So sad. If you're not acne prone I definitely recommend adding this to your skincare routine.

faceoff_positive.comments: I've been using this product twice daily for most of this year, and it's The BEST skin, hydrating product I've had in a long time; moisturizing and KIND to the skin and eye area, minimizing fine lines. Sometimes I use it alone under makeup, and other times I do add a dermatologist prescribed tinted sunscreen. I'm 65+ and people comment on my skin not aging. I think the only other product in the past that I've had that was beneficial to my skin was a Sente product that I had years ago. I can no longer use the common store-counter products that retail stores sell. I have environmental allergies and sensitivities (no perfumes or candles), and have been on much prednisone, and periodic breakouts from rosacea. This is a Winner!! I recently was fortunate to buy the product, 2/for a low price on HSN, and it was a great sale. I shop around for the best price, otherwise I'd buy from the Beekman Web site.   Also, I've used the goat milk soap and body cream for years, and the products have made a great improvement on the damage, thinning and wrinkling, that prednisone did to the skin on my arms, making it smooth again. Thank you, Dr. Brent and Josh!!
faceoff_positive.headline: A Winner and Full of Kindness!!

faceoff_negative.comments: I wanted to like this product so much b/c I do love other products by Beekman.  However, EVERY time I have used this as part of my skin care routine, it pills and ruins the entire regimen.  I end up washing my face all over again, repeating every step and leaving this out.  No pilling. I have tried with various combos, stupidly hoping it won't pill this time only to have to re-cleanse my face and start over.  This product is a fail for me.  I didn't finish the bottle or even give it away. I just ended up tossing it b/c i missed the return window trying to give it a chance.  #sadtrombone
faceoff_negative.headline: Pills - very annoying!
